bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names jin chun chuang 緊唇瘡 , tight lips sores; chun jin 唇緊 , tight lips; shen chun 渖唇 , leaking lips; chun shen 唇渖 , lip leakage. Pathological Condition with lips growing sores, as well as swelling, distension, festering, fissures and pain. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 風邪寒濕之氣搏於瘡，則微腫濕爛，或冷或熱，乍瘥乍 發，積月累年，謂之緊唇 , “When the sores are struck by the qi of wind evil, cold and moisture, they will develop a slight swelling with moist festering which may be cold or hot; it may appear to heal and then develops again. This continues for months and even years, and is called ‘ tight lips ’”.
